ygData.subject: RE: Value of lambent stones (was AC Dilemma)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... First time I experienced it was almost 3 months ago when I was level 27 or so (I m level 40 now).  It s more prevelant when you re using the song on mobs
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 12 Nov 1999, Tom Henschel wrote:
>
> I have had this problem since Monday too. Screech playing away and no
> message and no effect. :( Not consistant though.

First time I experienced it was almost 3 months ago when I was
level 27 or so (I'm level 40 now). It's more prevelant when
you're using the song on mobs closer to your level; which
incidently is also when the Pixie Strike bug most often
happens. It's annoying, but in my experience doesn't happen
often enough to be a major hassle unless several of them got
stringed together.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
